name: Captive's Call
description:
Enjoy a single player puzzle/adventure game in which you control your party of four -- the warlock, the wizard, the pickpocket, and the sailor -- and use their special abilities to escape Azrad's dungeon!

  • Get from the start to the finish in each level
  • Learn each characters unique skills through character specific levels
  • Encounter guards and traps that can be avoided or manipulated
  • Switch party members to strategically optimize your moves taken
  • Collect coins for added challenge
